meanings.definition: The quality or state of being soupy.
meanings.sent1: The soupiness of the stew made it easy to slurp.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy the soupiness of a warm bowl of chicken noodle soup.
meanings.sent3: The soupiness of the pudding surprised me, but it tasted delicious.
meanings.sent4: Her tears added a soupiness to her voice as she spoke about her lost pet.
meanings.sent5: The soupiness of the mud after the rain made it difficult to walk through.

meanings.definition: The characteristic of having the consistency of soup.
meanings.sent1: The soupiness of the oatmeal made it comforting on a cold morning.
meanings.sent2: The soupiness of the sauce made the pasta dish more flavorful.
meanings.sent3: The soupiness of the paint made it challenging to create precise lines.
meanings.sent4: The soupiness of the fog enveloped the city in a mysterious haze.
meanings.sent5: The soupiness of the batter resulted in fluffy pancakes.
